title: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing ShiftLeft on lines with intermixed tabs and spaces, the text does not move.
EB: When executing ShiftLeft on lines with intermixed tabs and spaces, the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left at least to the space character (i.e., get rid of the tab). It is also important to replace the tab character in the first line with spaces so that the two lines are indented the same visually. Additionally, having a stray space is confusing as it prevents the text from shifting.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a default text editor. 2. Type in the following on two separate lines, intermixing spaces and tabs: <space><tab>some text<tab>some text2. 3. Highlight the two lines and execute the ShiftLeft command. Notice that nothing moves.
